attributes.action: Put David Attenborough on the new £50 note
attributes.background: David Attenborough deserves to be on the new £50 note more than anyone else. He is a British household name and has brought so much wonder and joy to our lives, showing us the natural world in ways more spectacular than any other person. Attenborough is a national treasure and we owe him the honour.

rejection.details:
Bank notes are the responsibility of the Bank of England, which is independent of the Government and Parliament. 

You can find out how the Bank decides who will be on bank notes here: 

https://www.bankofengland.co.uk/banknotes/banknote-characters
